channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Download Manager and File Sharing Plugin with frontend file upload – a better Media Library — Shared Files

item.title: CVE-2021-24736|2024-08-03T19:42:16.864Z -- unknown -- easy%20download%20manager%20and%20file%20sharing%20plugin%20with%20frontend%20file%20upload%20%E2%80%93%20a%20better%20media%20library%20%E2%80%94%20shared%20files
item.description: The Easy Download Manager and File Sharing Plugin with frontend file upload – a better Media Library — Shared Files WordPress plugin before 1.6.57 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings before outputting them in attributes, which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues.
